content: Where’s the rest of the language discussion held? I want to discuss ternary bit match patterns (I.e. “0t10--“ or some similar syntax would match 1000, 1001, 1010, and 1011)
There's a T-lang stream, you might have to open the stream list and search through the "all streams" section and subscribe to it

That sort of discussion is probably best held here or on internals.rust-lang.org, though you could float the idea in #t-lang too. I would expect that sort of addition to be outside the current priorities though.
Though balanced ternary is the obviously-superior number system.
if we don't even have 1 as a working f32 literal then i don't wanna hear nothing about your silly balanced numbers scott :P
